attributes.title: The Time for Trash - #601
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Jon Risinger as they talk about how now is truly the time to just watch the stuff you want and not worry about if it's a critical masterpiece that is enlightening you.
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Jon Risinger as they talk about how now is truly the time to just watch the stuff you want and not worry about if it's a critical masterpiece that is enlightening you. You can obviously watch that stuff, but you shouldn't feel obligated to, especially when you're not feeling like doing the mental heavy lifting or having that emotional tax put on yourself. Again, you do you. Watch what you want to. Love Island is there if you need it. That's the moral here, I think.

attributes.title: You Look Like the Lorax - #602

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Chad James as they talk about Chad's old ass chair that he has had for 20 years and probably has messed up his spine and his wife is mad at him for having. attributes.title: We're Not Buying a Robot Dog - #603
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Andrew Rosas as they talk about police lights and lighting tricks and for some reason this robot dog thing that we're not buying because I don't have the budget for a robot dog.
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Andrew Rosas as they talk about police lights and lighting tricks and for some reason this robot dog thing that we're not buying because I don't have the budget for a robot dog. I mean I get it, it's cool but what would we do with it? It's a robot dog. What a waste. It would just sit there. Can't even pick it up and show it off like Gavin's cat or Gus's dog. It would just hop around and you'd go "ha ha when is the ice cream podcast." I'm not paying for that.
attributes.display_title: We're Not Buying a Robot Dog - #603

attributes.description: Join Barbara Dunkelman, Gavin Free, Chris Demarais, and Jessica Vasami as they summon face Exodia, left eye of the Dunkelman, right arm of the Vasami, left mouth of the Free, and right mouth of the Demarais all in your hand at the same time. attributes.title: A Gavin Sandwich - #605

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Gus Sorola as they talk about how Adam left which was weird because we were pretty clear about there being a post show. It's on the calendar invite. I mean we couldn't be more clear. But it's fine. We do this funny Gus bit in this episode so honestly it's worth it, I think. Let me know if you like it by using the hashtag #AdamsLastPodcastAppearance

attributes.title: CIA Youtube Recruitment for Gus - #606
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Drew Saplin as they talk about China maps being wrong, which is a really weird fact.
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Drew Saplin as they talk about China maps being wrong, which is a really weird fact. They shift satelites? How weird. I messed up a map of the United States in the 6th grade, I put Iowa where Ohio was. I'm still not clear on what state Ohio is but it doesn't feel like it matters. What am I missing out on? Skyline Chili? Grow up.

attributes.title: What Movie Has the Quickest Cow - #607
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Blaine Gibson as they talk about First Cow.
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Blaine Gibson as they talk about First Cow. It's shot in 4:3 which is weird and pretty art house but Gus didn't like it at all. You have to be pretty patient with it to get something out of it, I think. The critics reviews are like really high but does that make you want to watch it? They don't meet the cow for like an hour. Think about it.
